RESUME_TIPS: Enhance the skills section by explicitly mentioning **demand forecasting** techniques you've used, such as time series analysis or regression models, to directly align with the job requirements. Illustrate this with an example from your DealShare experience, quantifying the **forecast accuracy** improvements achieved.

In your Udaan experience, elaborate on how you managed **inventory levels** and implemented **replenishment strategies**, specifying the **inventory turnover** achieved. Mention any experience using **ABC classification** to prioritize inventory management.

Detail your experience with **inventory optimization** techniques, such as analyzing **slow moving items** and implementing strategies to reduce **overstocked items**. Quantify the impact on **inventory turnover ratio** or working capital.

Incorporate your familiarity with **ERP systems** like **NetSuite**, **Zoho**, or **Unicommerce** under your Skills section, even if you have basic exposure. Mention any experience integrating these systems with data analysis tools like **Power BI** to provide real-time insights.

Expand on your experience with **supply chain** processes, highlighting any involvement in **central warehouse** management or **stock movement** analysis. Mention any contributions to improving **store fill rate** or reducing **stock out** occurrences.

When describing your experience with MIS reports, emphasize your ability to derive actionable insights that improve **forecast accuracy**. Quantify improvements in **forecast accuracy** resulting from your analysis and reporting efforts.

Showcase your ability to collaborate with **merchandising** and **sales** teams to align **inventory planning** with marketing promotions and regional preferences. Provide a specific example from DealShare where your collaboration improved **sales** performance.

Mention any experience you have with **EOQ** (Economic Order Quantity) models or similar **inventory planning** techniques. Explain how you applied these models to optimize **inventory levels** and minimize costs in your previous roles.

In the professional summary, emphasize your experience with **inventory analytics** and **replenishment strategies** to align directly with the job description. Quantify your impact on key performance indicators like **inventory turnover** or **stock out %**.

Describe any experience you have with managing **omnichannel inventory** across both retail and e-commerce channels, highlighting challenges and solutions in synchronizing **inventory levels** and **replenishment** processes. Provide an example from your experience at Udaan or DealShare.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Gain practical knowledge of demand planning process improvement and change management.

Demand Forecasting.DESCRIPTION: Learn demand forecasting, inventory planning, and supply chain management techniques.
Learn the basic concepts of forecasting and time series analysis.

Inventory Analytics.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use data analytics to optimize inventory management practices.
Understand key inventory management concepts and improve inventory control.
A free YouTube tutorial covering different inventory analysis and management techniques.

ABC classification.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to classify inventory using ABC analysis to prioritize resources effectively.
Covers ABC Analysis as part of a broader range of inventory management techniques.
A YouTube tutorial explaining the principles and application of ABC analysis.

EOQ.DESCRIPTION: Learn about the EOQ model for optimizing inventory levels and minimizing costs.
Learn how to calculate the economic order quantity to manage inventory efficiently.
A YouTube video explaining the EOQ model and its application in inventory management.

ERP systems.DESCRIPTION: Understand the fundamentals of ERP systems and how they integrate various business processes.
Provides an introduction to ERP systems and their applications in business management.
A YouTube video explaining what ERP systems are and their importance in business.

NetSuite.DESCRIPTION: Learn the basics of NetSuite ERP and navigate its key functionalities.
Comprehensive training on using NetSuite for various business operations.
A collection of free YouTube videos covering different aspects of NetSuite ERP.

Zoho.DESCRIPTION: Official Zoho training for using Zoho Inventory effectively.
Learn how to use Zoho Inventory for managing stocks and optimizing inventory.
A YouTube tutorial on how to use Zoho Inventory for inventory management.

Unicommerce.DESCRIPTION: Learn how to use Unicommerce for managing your e-commerce operations.
An online course that covers order and inventory management using Unicommerce.
A set of tutorials for using Unicommerce for e-commerce and inventory management.

Supply Chain.DESCRIPTION: Gain an understanding of how supply chains work and how to manage them effectively.

Supply Chain.COURSE_NAME: Supply Chain Management: A Complete Guide
